4.21.19  4:44 am   Is it boring answering all these questions every day?
4.21.19  3:10 am   What's you transcription process? Do you figure out the melody then the chords, or something else? Is it different for each tune?
4.21.19  2:04 am   ever feel like something was supposed to happen but it didn't happen?
4.21.19  1:58 am   Tips on getting yourself on a consistent sleep schedule so you don't deprive yourself of sleep?

4.21.19  1:25 am   let's say that i desperately wanna make my own music, just as you are, but i have absolutely no experience in making my voice sound remotely good. i've got good ears and pitch and everything, but the voice just sounds bad and the technique is nonexistent. how do you think i could at least get my voice to a good baseline which i could expand on throughout my life, in like a solid two months?
i know "just do it a lot" is a great answer here, but how do i "just do it" well enough that i can make solid progress along with that? i think i know how this works for physical instruments which i can observe the mechanics of in front of my eyes, but the voice is too obscure, where should i even start? i can feel myself dipping into that 13th level of suffering
4.20.19  10:49 pm   What are birds?
4.20.19  10:30 pm   any advice for figuring out the harmonies to your jingles? i can handle ur songs but the jingles escape me

4.20.19  10:26 pm   are u chaotic chaotic? hank green seems to think so http://edwardspoonhands.tumblr.com/post/184323097102 but your output is so organized here! and you schedules seem so important to you! i like and respect him and also like and respect u so i know categories are not usually a thing u choose to classify yourself with but this is really interesting. maybe he just meant in person. chaos seemed to be one of the goals of the h3 interview. or maybe just a result? do u pursue chaos intentionally?

4.20.19  11:27 am   Hello, I have a question concerning synchronization of sound and images. You make text appear when the lyrics are said. Sometimes I edit films and I find it hard to synchronize a sound and a visual precisely, espacially when the tempo is fast. Sometimes I need to anticipate the sound by 1 (or 2) frames with the image, but sometimes it feels off. Sometimes I try to do it by just hitting spacebar when it is the right moment to put the image, but i'm not quite sure of this method. What is your experience regardning this aspect of editing? Are there some software that make it more intuitive, for that particular issue?

4.20.19  9:43 am   Hey Bill, can you help me with this argument?
So there's this argument about pop music, that it's too simplistic, vague, repetitive, and easy to produce but mostly too repetitive.

What do you think?

4.19.19  9:44 pm   Do you know of any song that goes IVM7 iiim7 VIIbM7 visus4 III IVM7 iiim7 I6 ii6 III vi or anything like that (treating vi like the tonic chord)? It is for a song I'm writing but I feel like I got it from somewhere (or at least part of it). Does it sound original? If not, do you think it's a good progression? (please bleep it too if it does sound original) And, do you have any suggestions?

4.19.19  7:11 pm   I often write bits of songs, but I feel like sometimes I don't really want to say anything, or any words I think of have already been said before by someone else but songs generally have to have lyrics, yet I don't really want to write instrumental music. Do you have any advice?

4.19.19  7:07 pm   Some of your most recent notes releases have fascinated me.  Some of these notes feel like a lot more information is being revealed about you, or your processes.  That's not to say that all earlier notes havent been very revealing.  Do you feel as though you are consciously revealing more through lately or is it just sort of happening now? Do you deny that they're more revealing altogether?
